resources.string: Access to device location is required for the application to function properly, e.g. to show your precise location on a map and determine distances between towers.\n\nPlease, grant the device location permission to the application to gain full-fledged user experience.
GPS is disabled. GPS is required to let application function properly.\n\nWould you mind enabling it?

string.name: do_not_have_an_account_yet
string.u: Do not have an account yet?
